meta.name: Enrich Seller Data with Email & Domain Lookup using Bright Data & Google Search

values.outputKey: No domain but with business address and trade name

parameters.content:
## Search Domain+Email in Google using Bright Data
If the domain exist, use the search query "{{$json.domain}}+email".

## Search Seller Name+Address+Email in Google using Bright Data
If the domain exist, use the search query "{{$json.seller_name}}+{{ $json.seller_address }}+email".
